name: Christmas Crunch (Zaven Kazandjian, Nathan Ballay, AcidBurritos)
name_original: Christmas Crunch (Zaven Kazandjian, Nathan Ballay, AcidBurritos)
description:
Christmas Crunch!

Wait... Christmas is here!? You are unprepared for the holiday season and need to quickly clean, cook, and get gifts for your loved ones! Hurry up because time is ticking! You don't want to disappoint Santa Claus do you?

Created by Elise Lunenburg (Acid Burritos), Nathan Ballay (natedog334), and Zaven Kazandjian (Dinowolf10) for the Jame Gam Christmas Edition (2021)

Art: Elise Lunenburg (AcidBurritos)

Design and Programming: Nathan Ballay (natedog334) and Zaven Kazandjian (Dinowolf10)

Music: Elise Lunenburg (AcidBurritos)

Sound Effects: Elise Lunenburg (AcidBurritos) and Zaven Kazandjian (Dinowolf10)
